controller

Class expandedViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.expandedViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class expandedViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, java.io.Serializable
    Displays an album with all the photos in it.
    Author:
    Rizwan Khan(mrk150) && Ahmed Ghoneim(asg179)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
